name: ChopChop
0:
”Alexa, Chop Chop”
”Alexa, open Chop Chop”
”Alexa, start Chop Chop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chop chop
des:
Chop Chop is a handsfree kitchen companion serving up fun, easy to follow tutorials on chopping fresh produce. From the basics to the exotics, Chop Chop’s step-by-step instructions will have you slicing and dicing in no time.

Featuring 40+ original videos at launch, we’ll continue adding new fruits and veggies to the catalog over time. And that’s where you come in. If you fire up this skill and don’t find what you’re looking for, send us a Chop request at ★ FlavorFriday.com ★ and we’ll get it chopped and uploaded for you ASAP. The future of Chop Chop is in your hands.

See you in flavor town.

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

After you launch the skill, just say the name of any fruit or vegetable.
Or you can ask, “What’s New?”

Requires Amazon Echo Show or Echo Spot for video playback.

But no worries if you don’t have a screen. We made a special audio-only version just for you. (The Spot is SICK though. You should probably get one). Check out ★ FlavorFriday.com ★ for a Chop Chop video demo to see what you’re missing…

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

Only use knives with adult supervision.
Knives are sharp. Please be careful.

Eat more vegetables. Celebrate fruit.
And support your local farmers.

Music by Keshco
“The Ballad Of Ali Dia”
